subject: Music
title: Women in Jazz
description: A fast breakdown of Women in Jazz for builders.

hook.text: Women have played jazz since its birth â€” history just refused to credit them.

buildup.text: Mary Lou Williams arranged for Duke Ellington and Benny Goodman in the 1930s.

discovery.text: All-female bands like the International Sweethearts of Rhythm toured during World War II.

twist.text: Esperanza Spalding won Best New Artist at the Grammys over Justin Bieber â€” in 2011.

climax.text: Today, artists like Nubya Garcia and Terri Lyne Carrington lead jazz's new wave.

punchline.text: Women didn't arrive late to jazz. They were there all along.

quiz.question: Who beat Justin Bieber for Best New Artist at the 2011 Grammys?
